downloadTitle: Microsoft Host Integration Server 2013 Management Pack
downloadDescription: This management pack includes monitors and rules to effectively monitor the availability and health of Host Integration Server 2013.

downloadFile.name: Microsoft Host Integration Server 2013 MP Guide.doc

detailsSection: This management pack includes monitors and rules to monitor the availability and health of Host Integration Server 2013 using either System Center Operations Manager 2007 R2 or System Center Operations Manager 2012..
detailsSection_file_name: Microsoft Host Integration Server 2013 MP Guide.doc
systemRequirementsSection:
You have one of the following versions of System Center Operations Manager deployed:
  • System Center Operations Manager 2007 R2
  • System Center Operations Manager 2012
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download, or select a different language from the Change language drop-down list and click Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Run.
    • To save the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
